sn35.158:1.1: “Cakkhum, bhikkhave, yoniso manasi karotha, cakkhaniccatanca yathabhutam samanupassatha.
sn35.158:1.2: Cakkhum, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yoniso manasikaronto, cakkhaniccatanca yathabhutam samanupassanto cakkhusmimpi nibbindati.
sn35.158:1.8: jivham, bhikkhave, yoniso manasi karotha, jivhaniccatanca yathabhutam samanupassatha.
sn35.158:1.9: Jivham, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yoniso manasikaronto, jivhaniccatanca yathabhutam samanupassanto jivhayapi nibbindati.
sn35.158:1.14: manam, bhikkhave, yoniso manasi karotha, mananiccatanca yathabhutam samanupassatha.
sn35.158:1.15: Manam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yoniso manasikaronto, mananiccatanca yathabhutam samanupassanto manasmimpi nibbindati.
